channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Suspect identified in fatal shooting of Minnesota lawmaker

item.title: ‘No Kings’ rallies draw big crowds to protest Trump and his policies
item.description: Across the country, relatively few disruptions were reported during protests and marches where the mood ranged from joyful to defiant.

item.title: Minn. lawmaker, husband killed in shooting, setting off search for gunman
item.description: Another state legislator and his wife were also shot in the predawn hours in brazen attacks that officials called “politically motivated.”

item.title: Republicans ignore their own age issues in pursuit of Biden’s frailty
item.description: Just as old as Democrats in Washington, GOP lawmakers argue age is not an issue for their party’s future.

item.title: Trump reports over $600 million in income in latest financial disclosure

item.description: The president’s approval rating had been ticking upward since its biggest drop in April.

item.title: Trump’s chaotic economy is causing headaches for Democrats in New Jersey's governor race
item.description: The crowded contest in the Garden State shows how hard it is to address pocketbook issues.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
